overview:
Chris Heinz is the Chief Technology Officer and co-Founder of Rewardix, LLC. Rewardix brings to market a new social commerce model that takes advantage of the local relationships between merchants and consumers and changes how consumers save money and how merchants acquire, retain and reward customers for their loyalty.

Chris has decades of experience as a software architect and a software development manager, in a variety of environments. He was Vice President of Software Development and head software architect for Exstream Software. He also founded and ran his own software consulting company, Lexadica Software. He holds a B.S. in Physics from M.I.T.
